abstract: A unique identifier that is stable for the duration of a response, but not across responses.
overview:
## Overview

The framework guarantees a [doc://com.apple.foundationmodels/documentation/FoundationModels/GenerationID] to be both present and stable when you receive it from a [doc://com.apple.foundationmodels/documentation/FoundationModels/LanguageModelSession]. When you create an instance of [doc://com.apple.foundationmodels/documentation/FoundationModels/GenerationID] there is no guarantee an identifier is present or stable.
title: GenerationID
